Title: Calypso APT IOC
Description: It has been reported that Calypso APT is reportedly active in cyberspace. The Chinese state-sponsored threat activity group is reportedly exploiting the Proxy Logon Microsoft Exchange vulnerability. Threat actors abuse the vulnerability and install Plug X malware on the targeted system.
